name: WordPress ELEX WordPress HelpDesk & Customer Ticketing System plugin不安全的直接对象引用漏洞
product: ["WordPress ELEX WordPress HelpDesk & Customer Ticketing System plugin <=3.2.9"]
description: WordPress ELEX WordPress HelpDesk & Customer Ticketing System plugin是一款专为WordPress网站设计的帮助台与客户工单系统插件，旨在帮助企业或个人高效管理客户支持请求。WordPress ELEX WordPress HelpDesk & Customer Ticketing System plugin存在不安全的直接对象引用漏洞，该漏洞源于缺少用户控制密钥验证，攻击者可利用该漏洞导致读取所有支持票内容。
solution:
目前厂商已发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网:
https://wordpress.org/plugins/elex-helpdesk-customer-support-ticket-system
patch: WordPress ELEX WordPress HelpDesk & Customer Ticketing System plugin不安全的直接对象引用漏洞的补丁
